internal.content:
--- title: Pills description: Pills are used to highlight number of items. tabs: ['Usage', 'Code'] showMobile: true --- Pills are used to highlight number of items. For status and text, use a Badge. ### Types
#### Solid Solid Pills are used to highlight number of items in reference to a particular component so that the component gets recognized easily. eg Pill over the notification icon. #### Subtle Subtle Pills are used when many pills are used in reference to a group of components. In that case, solid pills become a bit overwhelming. eg Pills in vertical navigation items. ### Appearance A pill comes in 9 appearances. ### Properties


### Usage
#### Pills vs Badges Pills are used to display count of entities while badges are used for tagging entities. *image pending*
